title: Organizational Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Social Learning Capacity-Building Program Using Collaborative MOOCs

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary online learning experience and comprehension of fundamental social science concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can achieve over 80% of weekly learning objectives through knowledge sharing and feedback with peers in a collaborative MOOC environment.
Learners can complete team projects using digital collaboration tools (e.g., KakaoTalk Open Chat, Google Docs) in a Personal Learning Environment (PLE).
Learners record a score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) in MOOC design satisfaction and motivation level (based on IMMS criteria) upon course completion.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
